Great gift ideas for guys on V-Day Find out his hobbies. If the guy is into wine you'll want to get a fabulous decanter. If the guy's into cigars maybe a humidor. Find out what he collects, what he's interested in. It can be as simple as golf balls with his name on it. You can come up with really cool concepts.
